A tree structure for the posts in a thread. Now they are sequentially displayed bulletin board style.
implementing a tree structure in the post themselves is difficult, I never saw a 100% satisfying solution, but a tree-structured index before or after the posts, or both, e.g.

Post number one
Post number two
    Post number three
        Post number four
        Post number six
    Post number five
        Post number seven
Post number eight

like in some old web interfaces for mailing lists, would help recognizing who answers to whom.
